item.title: Community MeetUp - Installation of MongoDB via a Kubernetes Operator - POSTPONED
item.description: Hello, We are sorry to inform you that we have to POSTPONE our Community MeetUp of Today Thursday, Feb 24th, 11 am EST (5:00 pm CEST / 9:30 pm IST). A new schedule of the meeting will be announced soon. Thank you for your understanding. Percona Community Team Join us in The Percona Community MeetUp and walk with us through the installation of MongoDB via a Kubernetes operator.
